description: Make this Hacktoberfest a learning period and contribute to Great Open Source Projects.
Guzzle, an extensible PHP HTTP client
Nextcloud server, a safe home for all your data
PHP_CodeSniffer tokenizes PHP files and detects violations of a defined set of coding standards.
The new (and simple) admin generator for Symfony applications.
Faker is a PHP library that generates fake data for you
HTML and Form Builders for the Laravel Framework
A PHP library for generating universally unique identifiers (UUIDs).
A static analysis tool for finding errors in PHP applications
The RSS feed for websites missing it
MISP (core software) - Open Source Threat Intelligence and Sharing Platform (formely known as Malware Information Sharing Platform)
PHP library for the Stripe API.
Symfony Bundle for Doctrine ORM and DBAL

WordPress Develop, Git-ified. Synced from git://develop.git.wordpress.org/, including branches and tags! This repository is just a mirror of the WordPress subversion repository. Please include a link to a pre-existing ticket on

Your Own URL Shortener
A Laravel package that makes working with money in a secure manner a cinch!

Open Source Digital Experience Platform (DXP, MDM/PIM, CDP, DAM, CMS/UX & eCommerce

PHPMD is a spin-off project of PHP Depend and aims to be a PHP equivalent of the well known Java tool PMD. PHPMD can be seen as an user friendly frontend application for the raw metrics stream measured by PHP Depend.

WordPress, Git-ified. Synced via SVN every 15 minutes, including branches and tags! This repository is just a mirror of the WordPress subversion repository. Please do not send pull requests. Submit patches to

Liberating Web Analytics. Star us on Github? +1. Matomo is the leading open alternative to Google Analytics that gives you full control over your data. Matomo lets you easily collect data from websites, apps & the IoT and visualise this data and extract insights. Privacy is built-in. We love Pull Requests!
The PHP Unit Testing framework.
Doctrine Object Relational Mapper (ORM)
The classic email sending library for PHP
